name: Frobbit
description:
Made frantically for Mini-Jam 79: Frogs.

Play as a tiny adventurous frog caught in a cursed swamp. Survive as long as you can! Fend off the denizens of the swamp, catch flies to recover heath, and beware what lurks beyond the trees.

Made in the Godot engine. Art, sounds, and scripting done by me :)

Controls:

  • w-a-s-d - move
  • space  - jump
  • space, in air - dash
  • enter - wide attack
  • enter, while moving - long attack
  • enter, in air - slam attack
